'''Vigo Boffin''' was a [[Hobbits|Hobbit]] of [[the Shire]].

==History==
Vigo was the son of [[Jago Boffin]], and had a son [[Folco Boffin|Folco]]. They were both present at [[Bilbo's Farewell Party]].<ref>{{App|Boffin}}</ref>
